[[div class="doc" style="top: -3em;margin-bottom: -3rem;"]]
PERSONNEL FILE -- PIERRE GAUTHIER (PAGE 6)
[[/div]]
+++ >> PHYSICAL PROFILE: IDENTIFYING MARKS

Foundation Security Department regulations permit tattoos so long as they are not on the face, feet, hands, and do not contain indecent, explicit, or extremist content or messaging. Captain Gauthier has a number of tattoos and identifying scars accrued over his career in the Foundation. A list follows, in roughly-chronological order:
----
**TYPE:** Tattoo
**DESC:** An emblem of an upturned knife framed by two wings on the upper right bicep, 4x5cm.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Service History — Régiment d'opérations spéciales du Canada, ROSC, 2012 - 2022].

**TYPE:** Scar
**DESC:** A single 5cm long, straight scar across the stomach, consistent with high-caliber bullet grazing.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Royal Canadian Medical Service — CFB Suffield Hospitalization Records, 2017].

**TYPE:** Tattoo.
**DESC:** A cartoon of a lit stick of dynamite drifting down on a parachute on the left bicep, 6x6cm.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Intelligence File 65323424.2014 (Global War on Terror § Canadian Armed Forces, Operation Impact)].

**TYPE:** Tattoo
**DESC:** A field cross consisting of two boots and a rifle on the left forearm, 4x7cm.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See Page 11 § Psychological Profile & [# Site-12 Grief Counseling Records].

**TYPE:** Tattoo/Scar
**DESC:** An extremely faint scar in the shape of a Catholic cross on the lower neck, consistent with laser tattoo removal treatment.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See Page 11 § Psychological Profile — Religion.

**TYPE:** Scar
**DESC:** Four circular bullet scars spread across the lower abdomen, each 1x1cm in size.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Royal Canadian Medical Service — CFB Suffield Hospitalization Records, 2021] & [# Service History — Régiment d'opérations spéciales du Canada, ROSC, 2012 - 2022 § Honorable Discharge, § Sacrifice Medal].

**TYPE:** Scar
**DESC:** Scarring across the legs and back as a result of extensive explosive burns.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Royal Canadian Medical Service — CFB Suffield Hospitalization Records, 2021] & [# Service History — Régiment d'opérations spéciales du Canada, ROSC, 2012 - 2022 § Honorable Discharge, § Sacrifice Medal].

**TYPE:** Scar
**DESC:** General skin and nail damage on the fingertips of both hands as a result of long-term manual labor in unsafe working conditions.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See Page 9 § Employment History — Recruitment

**TYPE:** Tattoo
**DESC:** A stylized depiction of a naked mole rat with its teeth bared on the lower left bicep, 3x2cm.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Mobile Task Force Culture § Tattoos].

**TYPE:** Tattoo
**DESC:** A 2x3cm tattoo of a five-striped flag on the left wrist. A small date is written below it.
**RELEVANT FILES:**  See [# Site-12 Treatment Records (2024) § Gender-Affirming Care].

**TYPE:** Tattoo
**DESC:** A stylized depiction of a hammer striking an anvil on the collarbone, 3x2cm.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Mobile Task Force Culture § Tattoos].

**TYPE:** Scar
**DESC:** Largely-healed discoloration across upper back as a result of esomat exposure and ensuing cellular damage.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Incident Report — SITE43.BR84].

**TYPE:** Scar
**DESC:** Three circular bullet scars, approx. 1x1cm each, grouped across the left thigh.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Site-12 Hospitalization Records] & [# Foundation Star Recipients — 2023].

**TYPE:** Tattoo
**DESC:** Foundation seal surrounded by a wreath across the upper back, 8x9cm.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Security Department Officer Culture § Tattoos].

**TYPE:** Scar
**DESC:** Two identical, 6cm long scars under the pectoral muscles, each with a perpendicular line going up the nipple.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [# Site-12 Treatment Records (2027) § Gender Affirming Care].

**TYPE:** Tattoo
**DESC:** "Knowledge is Power" inscribed across the left wrist, 1x6cm.
**RELEVANT FILES:** See [#  RAISA Department Dossier § Mottos & Iconography] & Page 10 § Employment History — Site-7 Security Chief, Permanent Commission.

**TYPE:** Tattoo
**DESC:** A black semicolon mark on the right wrist, 1x3cm.
**RELEVANT FILES:** N/A
[[/div]]
